messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in 18 Naked Cowboys at Ram Ranch's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Prison Wing.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
